reviewText: Great and Enjoyable...must watch for all aviation enthusiasts!

5 1 13

SEVERAL PILOTS ARE FLYING THIER TRAFFIC PATTERNS IN THIS VIDEO 3 IN ALL ALL OF WHICH IS SUPERVISED BY A CHECKPILOT OVERSEEING THE PERFORMANCE OF THOSE IN THE LEFT SEAT:

I am Gerald from Hong Kong. It is a great DVD as it is different from others justplanes DVD - all about training.  Also, I received this package 2 weeks earlier than the estimated date. But if you are looking for high quality, this one is not for you - you better choose the blueray one.
